title: Uber | SDE 2 | Bangalore, India
content:
Education: B. Tech in CS (one of those old IITs) YOE: 2.5 Prior Experience: SDE 1 at MAGMA
Company: Uber Title: SDE II Location: Bangalore, India Salary: **45L (42L+3L PF & Retirals)** Relocation: **2L** Signing Bonus: **0L** (Uber stopped giving sigining bonus apparently. Why the hell did they?) Stock bonus: **$50K (25%/Y)** Bonus: **6.75L** Benefits: Standard Uber benefits
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **~62.5L**
Is this is the max possible offer at this YOE? I think base is already maxxed out, isn't it? Should I push for more stocks?

title: Oracle | QA Analyst 2 | IC2 | SDET
content:
